item.title: PinGod üåò Moon Station
item.description: Moon Station About A simple game built using the BasicGame as a template. Multiplayer 1-4 players 3 Balls Per Game Video Mode Service mode music menu Rules Shoot the hole for video mode… Download This download contains the exported and built MoonStation. Source Code PinGod Game Files Visual Pinball - (MoonStation (PinGod)-VPX10.vpx) üíæ Download (Mega) Playing in Visual Pinball Register controller see Running in VP Loading the table and launching it should be all the configuration you need to do before playing

item.title: PinGod üéÆ BasicGame
item.description: BasicGame About This is the most basic example of a game in PinGod and should be used as a starting point for the majority of games. Multiplayer 1-4 players 3 Balls Per Game Ball Trough (4 Balls) Manual Plunger Auto Plunger Multiball (4 ball) Ball Saves High Scores Attract Mode BasicGame - Visual Pinball: Download This download contains the exported and built BasicGame. PinGod Game Files Visual Pinball - (PinGodVp-BasicGame-VPX10-6.
item.dc:creator: HorsePin

item.title: üêé Flips VPX Derby
item.description: A simple roll-a-ball derby game in Visual Pinball with multiple players and CPU players. Feature Real horse names based on a race in 1986. Race commentary used from the race Instructions More Table info / todos can be found inside VP from the VP pause menu. Rules At least one human player needed to start the game and it’s first to the finish! CPU opponents will use the remaining bays.
item.dc:creator: HorsePin
